caption: A man is trying to find something to eat in his home, but he fails, at the same time, another woman and another man who is in the same room with him are talking. The woman finds something, and the man is really surprising. Another woman takes some food for them. One of the men goes downstairs and crush into a couple. He then realizes something and takes the book in the couple’s hand. At the same time, the man and woman in the house is attacked and sent to a place looks like a tunnel. The man who go downstairs goes back but finds no one home.
